context: Large retail chain facing supply chain disruptions, seeking to invest in digital supply chain technologies

request.purpose: Implement AI-powered demand forecasting and automated inventory management
request.justification: Current manual processes causing 20% stockouts and 15% overstock

decision_process.outcome: AI platform selected with proven retail results

business_impact.expected_outcome: 30% reduction in stockouts, 25% improvement in inventory turnover

lessons_learned: Digital supply chain investments require strong data foundation. Pilot programs essential for validating technology fit. Change management critical for operational staff adoption.
